issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Table level stats for external tables are set incorrectly

comments.body: This issue also happens when the table is managed but specified a location which is not in hive warehouse directory on hdfs.
This patch is generated based on the latest trunk code
The patch is generated based on the latest trunk code.
